title: The Affairs of the Other World Depend on the Corporate Slave
description:
The long-awaited "Isekai BL" comic is here!

When the efficiency freak corporate slave continued to work even in the other word—
He won the heart of the Knight Captain!?
 
Kondou Seiichirou was a salaryman who chased after work.
When he was dragged into a saint summoning and transferred to another world, he still didn’t change and continued to work.
But as he did so, he seemed to have unexpectedly raised a love flag with the “Ice Prince”...
